description: A commission-only luxury bladesmithing landing page for the fictional brand IGNIS LAMA (Blade of Fire). Dark charcoal palette with forge-orange ember accents, animated hexagonal grid hero canvas, 12-slot commission status board, Material Codex periodic-table grid, 7-stage process ritual horizontal scroll, maker portrait section, and invitation-only commission gate. Maximum 12 blades per year.
